title: Foundation workshop: Fun with fractals and programming for absolute beginners of fractals and programming
description:
Experience a guided tour through the first steps of programming. Simultaneously, you learn about imaginary numbers which, unlike any number you learn about in school, square to negative numbers. The end result will be a basic fractal viewer.
Bring something to sit on (for instance a jacket/coat), since the room we're in doesn't have any chairs.This is what a fractal looks like: https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR7m6NI5qKBmUPFXaFgcl0HxLGhRfKLdWdRwXNwQbctlfDkUVTvJQ&s'''[https://etherpad.wikimedia.org/p/36c3-python The code we created in the session]'''
